title: Admin Login and Dashboard Access
description: Test admin user authentication and verify access to admin-only features
steps: Navigate to https://msrms.netlify.app
Click on login if not already on login page
Enter username 'admin' in the username field
Enter password 'admin123' in the password field
Click the login button
Verify successful login and redirect to resumes dashboard
Verify admin-only features are visible (Users menu item)
Verify the user can see all resumes in the system

title: Resume Upload Functionality
description: Test the complete resume upload process including form validation and file handling
steps: Login as admin user
Navigate to the Upload page by clicking Upload in navigation
Fill in candidate name field with 'Test Candidate'
Fill in candidate email field with 'test@example.com'
Fill in candidate phone field with '+1234567890'
Fill in skills field with 'JavaScript, React, Node.js'
Fill in experience/notes field with 'Test experience'
Select a PDF file for upload
Click the upload/submit button
Verify successful upload message appears
Navigate back to resumes list and verify new resume appears

title: Resume Viewing and Download
description: Test resume file viewing and download functionality with proper file naming
steps: Login as admin user
Navigate to resumes list page
Find a resume in the list
Click the 'View' button on a resume
Verify that the resume file opens in a new tab or downloads
Check that the file name follows the expected format with candidate name

title: Dark Mode Toggle Functionality
description: Test theme switching between light and dark modes with persistence
steps: Navigate to the application
Look for the dark mode toggle button in the top navigation
Click the dark mode toggle button
Verify that the theme changes to dark mode
Refresh the page
Verify that the dark mode preference is persisted
Click the toggle again to switch back to light mode
Verify the theme changes back to light mode

title: Mobile Responsiveness Test
description: Test application functionality and layout on mobile devices and small screens
steps: Open the application in a mobile viewport or resize browser to mobile size
Verify that the navigation menu adapts to mobile (hamburger menu)
Test login functionality on mobile
Navigate through different pages and verify layout adapts
Test resume upload on mobile device
Verify all buttons and forms are accessible on touch devices

title: Admin User Management
description: Test admin-only user creation and management functionality
steps: Login as admin user
Navigate to Users page (admin only feature)
Verify existing users are listed
Click 'Add User' or similar button to create new user
Fill in new user form with test data
Select user role (admin or recruiter)
Submit the form
Verify new user appears in the users list
Verify success message is displayed

title: Recruiter Role Access Control
description: Test role-based access control and verify recruiter permissions
steps: Login with recruiter credentials if available
Verify that Users menu/page is not accessible to recruiter
Verify recruiter can access assigned resumes
Verify recruiter can upload new resumes
Try to access admin-only features and verify access is denied
Verify appropriate error messages for unauthorized access

title: Resume Assignment Functionality
description: Test resume assignment to recruiters and verify assignment persistence
steps: Login as admin user
Navigate to a resume detail page
Look for assignment functionality
Select a recruiter from dropdown/list
Assign the resume to the selected recruiter
Verify assignment is saved successfully
Verify assignment is reflected in resume list

title: Resume Share Link Generation
description: Test secure share link generation and WhatsApp integration
steps: Login as any authorized user
Navigate to a resume detail page
Look for share/WhatsApp button
Click to generate share link
Verify share link is generated
Test WhatsApp integration if available
Open share link in incognito/new browser
Verify resume is accessible via share link without login

title: Error Handling and Validation
description: Test application error handling, validation, and edge cases
steps: Try to login with invalid credentials
Verify appropriate error message is shown
Try to upload non-PDF file
Verify file type validation works
Try to submit forms with missing required fields
Verify validation messages appear
Test network error scenarios by going offline
Verify graceful error handling for network issues

title: User Logout Functionality
description: Test user logout process and session clearing
steps: Login as any user
Navigate to different pages to establish session
Click logout button/link
Verify redirect to login page
Try to access protected routes directly
Verify user is redirected to login page
Verify session data is cleared
